definition: Isopentenyladenosine-5'-diphosphate + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> trans-Zeatin riboside diphosphate + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
name: isopentenyladenosine-5'-diphosphate,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (trans-zeatin-riboside-diphosphate-forming)
